author: mkwan
msg: For XSLTC extension integration. Support creating ObjectType from a Class
object. Add an additional field to store the Class.

author: mkwan
msg: For Bugzilla 12077. Fixed problem with func:function in included stylesheet.
Add exsltFunction to the templateElements list so that we can detect the error where
func:function is embedded in another (e.g. xsl:variable) element.

author: mkwan
msg: For Bugzilla 11341. Let RTFIterator extend NodeSetDTM so that it is the kind
of DTMIterator expected by DTMNodeList. This also fixes the problem in

author: mkwan
msg: Make the tokenize function conformed with the EXSLT spec. Reuse
the Document object to reduce memory usage.

author: mkwan
